Timothy Simpson was known in the department as a model sergeant who had a taste for practical jokes and loved fishing and boating, Charles Ramsey said. he was also a best friend to a lot of people, including sgt. stephen liczbinski, his former partner, who was slain in the spring. Timothy Simpson put the handcuffs on the last suspect arrested in liczbinski's killing and helped raise money for the family, Charles Ramsey said.
